original_text: The towns you give the Levites from the land the Israelites possess are to be given in proportion to the inheritance of each tribe: Take many towns from a tribe that has many, but few from one that has few.”
korean_text: 너희가 이스라엘 자손의 소유에서 레위인에게 너희가 성읍을 줄 때에 많이 받은 자에게서는 많이 떼어서 주고 적게 받은 자에게서는 적게 떼어 줄 것이라 각기 받은 기업을 따라서 그 성읍들을 레위인에게 줄지니라

sentences.original_text: The towns you give the Levites
from the land the Israelites possess
are to be given in proportion
to the inheritance of each tribe
Take many towns from a tribe that has many
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 것을 가진 지파에서는 많은 성읍을 취하고

sentences.original_text: but few from one that has few
sentences.korean_translation: 적은 것을 가진 지파에서는 적게 취하라
